segments.text: I see the cookies in that jar, and I can’t blame the kids for wanting them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But they should really be asking their mother instead of sneaking around like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It feels wrong to watch them take something without permission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way the boy stretches upward is both cute and alarming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a strange mix of innocence and mischief; I can't help but feel torn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s hopeful stance pulls at my heartstrings, yet warns me of the consequences.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish they could see how easy it would be for everything to go wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR
